title.value: UK Core Person Marital Status Scotland

description.value: A set of codes that define the marital status of a person, as specified by the person. These codes and their descriptions represent concepts used in Scotland and are copied from the content of the [ISD Scotland Data Dictionary Marital Status](https://www.ndc.scot.nhs.uk/Dictionary-A-Z/Definitions/index.asp?Search=M&ID=319&Title=Marital%20Status) web page on 14/10/2022.
